title: Drawing, Four Studies of the Sepulcri in Ravenna; Head of Dante in Profile; Verso: Profile Head Studies, 1814–18
title_raw: Four Studies of the Sepulcri in Ravenna; Head of Dante in Profile; Verso: Profile Head Studies
medium: Pen and ink, brush and watercolor washes over graphite on laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed: 201, 1046; inscribed under the tomb: MALATESTA. Inscribed under the next tomb: ALFO MALATESTA. And inscribed under the third tomb: DANTE RAVENNA.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Four studies of sepulcri in Ravenna; Dante's head shown in profile; Verso: head with cornucopia and lion pelt, masculine head in profile after antique.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Four Studies of the Sepulcri in Ravenna; Head of Dante in Profile; Verso: Profile Head Studies, 1814–18. Pen and ink, brush and watercolor washes over graphite on laid paper. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2376
